de.esoco.lib.io

Class StreamFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.io.StreamFunctions

  • public class StreamFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to stream and I/O related function implementations. All functions map occurring IO exceptions to a FunctionException runtime exception.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.io.InputStream,java.io.Reader> createReader()
      Returns a new function that creates a new InputStreamReader from an InputStream input value.
      static de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryPredicate<java.io.InputStream,byte[]> find(byte[] rToken, int nMax)
      Returns a new binary predicate that invokes StreamUtil.find(Reader, String, int, boolean, de.esoco.lib.io.StreamUtil.ReadHandler).
      static de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryPredicate<java.io.Reader,java.lang.String> find(java.lang.String sToken, int nMax, boolean bIgnoreCase)
      Returns a new binary predicate that invokes StreamUtil.find(Reader, String, int, boolean, de.esoco.lib.io.StreamUtil.ReadHandler).
      static de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.io.InputStream,byte[]> readAll(int nBufferSize, int nMaxLength)
      Returns a new function that invokes reads all available data from an input stream by invoking StreamUtil.readAll(InputStream, int, int).
      static de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryFunction<java.io.Reader,java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readUntil(java.lang.String sToken, int nMax, boolean bIgnoreCase)
      Returns a new binary function that invokes the method StreamUtil.readUntil(Reader, Writer, String, int, boolean) and returns either the string found or NULL if the given token didn't occur in the data that has been read up to the maximum..

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createReader

        public static de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.io.InputStream,java.io.Reader> createReader()
        Returns a new function that creates a new InputStreamReader from an InputStream input value. The reader will be stored in a field of the function instance to prevent it from being closed by garbage collection which would cause the underlying stream to be closed too.
        Returns:
        A new function instance

      • find

        public static de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryPredicate<java.io.InputStream,byte[]> find(byte[] rToken,
                                                                                       int nMax)
        Returns a new binary predicate that invokes StreamUtil.find(Reader, String, int, boolean, de.esoco.lib.io.StreamUtil.ReadHandler).
        Parameters:
        rToken - The token to search
        nMax - The maximum number of characters to read
        Returns:
        A new binary predicate instance

      • find

        public static de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryPredicate<java.io.Reader,java.lang.String> find(java.lang.String sToken,
                                                                                            int nMax,
                                                                                            boolean bIgnoreCase)
        Returns a new binary predicate that invokes StreamUtil.find(Reader, String, int, boolean, de.esoco.lib.io.StreamUtil.ReadHandler).
        Parameters:
        sToken - The token to search
        nMax - The maximum number of characters to read
        bIgnoreCase - TRUE if the case of the token should be ignored
        Returns:
        A new binary predicate instance

      • readAll

        public static de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.io.InputStream,byte[]> readAll(int nBufferSize,
                                                                                   int nMaxLength)
        Returns a new function that invokes reads all available data from an input stream by invoking StreamUtil.readAll(InputStream, int, int).
        Parameters:
        nBufferSize - The buffer size to use
        nMaxLength - The maximum length to read
        Returns:
        A new function instance

      • readUntil

        public static de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryFunction<java.io.Reader,java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readUntil(java.lang.String sToken,
                                                                                                                 int nMax,
                                                                                                                 boolean bIgnoreCase)
        Returns a new binary function that invokes the method StreamUtil.readUntil(Reader, Writer, String, int, boolean) and returns either the string found or NULL if the given token didn't occur in the data that has been read up to the maximum..
        Parameters:
        sToken - The token to search
        nMax - The maximum number of characters to read
        bIgnoreCase - TRUE if the case of the token should be ignored
        Returns:
        A new binary function instance
